Posts.Content: Aug 5, 2011 11:55PM pinkpalette wrote: Yes it is a nightmare....but we are all here for you.  I am also Her2+ like you and I am just in the midst of completing my #2 chemo with herceptin - the miracle drug for Her2+.  My schedule is that I will get Herceptin for 1 year.  You will be OK, many strong women have traveled this journey before us.  Be strong for your family, have hope, you are a survivor!!!!
